details.description:
Luxury Living in Ditmas Park ? No Broker Fee (Photos are of a similar unit with same finishes)
This beautiful elevator building is nestled on a picturesque, tree-lined street and ready for an August 1st move-in!
Apartment Features: Spacious bedrooms with ample closet space
- Back yard - Generously sized living area - Abundant natural light throughout - Gleaming hardwood floors - Individual split units in each room for personalized climate control
Building Amenities: Resident lounge Fully furnished rooftop and outdoor spaces Bike storage On-site laundry room Co-working space with computer stations and complimentary Wi-Fi State-of-the-art fitness center
Prime Location: Just steps from the B/Q and 2/5 subway lines ? convenient access to everything Brooklyn and beyond has to offer!
No broker fee Available now Pets welcome

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Backyard, Central A/C

details.description:
Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.
Available 2/1 Small pets OK

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances

details.description:
MySpace exclusive!
Spacious one bedroom in well maintained pre war building in Williamsburg. Large living room perfect for entertaining. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Short walk to the J,M,G and L trains. Super easy to get anywhere! Pies-n-Thighs, The Rosemont, Testo, Align Coffee, Williamsburg Pizza, Modern Love Vega, etc all nearby. Incredible Williamsburg location.
Available Feb 1 Small pets OK!

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Myspace Exclusive! Large 2 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
Incredible 2 bedroom apartment with HUGE PRIVATE BACKYARD, perfect for entertaining. Large living room with separate kitchen. Both bedrooms big enough for queen size beds and furniture. Ample closet space throughout.
NO BROKER FEE! First + Security to move in February 1 move in

details.description: Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

details.description:
The Baltic Canal ? Modern Living in Boerum Hill
Studios, 1-; 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio; panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus; Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops; F/G/R trains.
📅 Schedule your tour today and make The Baltic Canal your next home.

details.description:
Modern 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

amenities.other: Dishwasher

details.description:
77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath!
Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

amenities.other: A/C, Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Stainless steel appliances, Central A/C

details.description:
? One Fifty Lawrence ? Elevated Living in the Heart of Downtown Brooklyn
Welcome to One Fifty Lawrence, a modern 25-story tower redefining Brooklyn living. Nestled between Fulton and Willoughby Streets, this striking new residence blends refined design, thoughtful amenities, and unbeatable convenience ? just steps from the Jay St?MetroTech subway hub.
Inside, discover bright studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments with expansive windows, high ceilings, and sleek finishes. Each home is crafted for comfort and style, featuring top-of-the-line appliances, in-unit laundry, and energy-efficient systems.
Residents enjoy access to an impressive amenity collection: a state-of-the-art fitness center, rooftop terrace with sweeping skyline views, resident lounge, and co-working spaces ? all within a pet-friendly community.
At One Fifty Lawrence, you?re surrounded by everything Downtown Brooklyn offers ? premier shopping, dining, and cultural destinations ? while being minutes from Manhattan and the rest of the borough.
Modern design. Urban energy. Unmatched convenience. This is One Fifty Lawrence.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Hardwood Floors, Stainless steel appliances, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C

details.description: Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 BR / 2 bath duplex apartment with balcony in Williamsburg, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby's All Right, Patrizia's, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold. Short commute to Manhattan; easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short distance to the JMZ trains

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Duplex, Hardwood Floors, Washer/Dryer In Unit

details.description: Explore refined living in this 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 144 West St in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. This boutique residence is nestled along the vibrant East River Waterfront, offering spacious layouts and elegant interiors. With floor-to-ceiling windows and warm oakwood floors, the unit is filled with natural light and inviting design. The kitchen boasts custom ivory cabinetry, sleek white quartz countertops, and Bosch stainless steel appliances, while the in-unit washer and dryer add modern convenience. The bathroom is your private retreat with a deep soaking tub. This pet-friendly building is also conveniently close to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue, making your commute a breeze.

amenities.other: Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Microwave, Central A/C, Hardwood Floors

details.description:
Gorgeous Brand New 1 Bedroom/ 1.5 bathroom DUPLEX Apartment in the Heart of East Williamsburg! The building has everything you want and need- elevator, fully-equipped gym, laundry room, bike storage, communal lounge on every floor. And best yet, a rooftop with amazing views and a gorgeous garden!This unit has 1 Large Queen size bedroom, all equipped with closets and floor to ceiling windows bringing in tons of sunlight! The Lower Level is a massive optional room or second living room with a half bathroom and separate entrance. PARKING AVAILABLE!
Featuring Stainless Steel Appliances, Dishwasher, Central AC and Heat, and hardwood floors, this apartment not only offers luxury, but also the comfort of a new home for you. You are just minutes from the Montrose L train and the Flushing JMZ trains.
